content.html: Very funny to me that they took a movie called “Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them” and decided to do an espionage-heavy slog of a prequel about this old dork instead of a shamelessly Pokémon copycat thing with little monsters.
content.value: Very funny to me that they took a movie called “Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them” and decided to do an espionage-heavy slog of a prequel about this old dork instead of a shamelessly Pokémon copycat thing with little monsters.
